attributes.additional_details: Longer lunch breaks can significantly impact their health, fostering better eating habits and reducing stress. Moreover, increased social interaction during lunch breaks promotes emotional and social growth
attributes.background: ensuring that students have ample time to eat relax, and socialize. Additionally allocating increased funding to schools for the expansion of cafeteria facilities, hiring more lunch staff, or implementing staggered lunch periods could accommodate longer breaks without disrupting the overall schedule

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Require schools to have lunch breaks at least 40 minutes long: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640292

Require all schools to have at least 75 minutes of break time a day: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638655

Increase free school meal budget for all schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643288
